Title: Time Out of Mind
Plot: Allison dreams that she's a woman who's been committed to a mental institution in 1959.  After viewing taped sessions from the clinic, Allison discovers that the woman from her dream had made claims of being Allison DuBois, living in 2005.
GuestStars: Carson Elrod, Oriana Oppice, Rami Malek, Bonnie Urseth, Derick Alexander, Ronald William Lawrence, Sam Anderson, Tim Conlon, Natasha Gregson Wagner, Barbara Tarbuck, Chloe Webb, Steven M. Gagnon, Loren Lazerine
